fields.name: Dwarf
fields.description: Brave, stalwart folk as sturdy as the stone kingdoms they carve inside mountains.
fields.language: You know the Common and Dwarvish languages.
fields.talent: Stout. Start with +2 HP. Roll your hit point gains with advantage.

fields.name: Elf
fields.description: Ethereal, graceful people who revere knowledge and beauty. Elves see far and live long.
fields.language: You know the Common, Elvish, and Sylvan languages.
fields.talent: Farsight. You get a +1 bonus to attack rolls with ranged weapons or a +1 bonus to spellcasting checks.

fields.name: Goblin
fields.description: Green, clever beings who thrive in dark, cramped places. As fierce as they are tiny.
fields.language: You know the Common and Goblin languages.
fields.talent: Keen Senses. You can't be surprised.

fields.name: Halfling
fields.description: Small, cheerful country folk with mischievous streaks. They enjoy lifeâ€™s simple pleasures.
fields.talent: Stealthy. Once per day, you can become invisible for 3 rounds.

fields.name: Half-Orc
fields.description: Towering, tusked warriors who are as daring as humans and as relentless as orcs.
fields.language: You know the Common and Orcish languages.
fields.talent: Mighty. You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls with melee weapons.

fields.name: Human
fields.description: Bold, adaptable, and diverse people who learn quickly and accomplish mighty deeds.
fields.language: You know the Common language and one additional common language.
fields.talent: Ambitious. You gain one additional talent roll at 1st level.
